description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) has registered fraudulent domains such as "mail-newyorker.com" and "news12.com.recover-session-service.site" to target specific victims with phishing attacks.(Citation: Certfa Charming Kitten January 2021)
